title: Mouse Cursor from user provided data
body:
I need a way to create a mouse cursor (CoreCursor) from my own data, such as:
RGBA8 array of pixel colors
int w, int h - size of the image
int x, int y - hot_spot in the image.

comments.body: 4 years later still can't create a mouse cursor. looks like UWP is dead
Having this feature would be useful for LibSDL (https://libsdl.org) ongoing port to UWP. It has APIs to create cursors from user-provided data, however that API is not supported in UWP.
